alert.note: Alert for Mellette; Todd (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 18 at 9:22PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Todd and southern Mellette Counties through 1100 PM CDT... At 1022 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 2 miles north of Cedar Butte to 2 miles south of Rosebud to 8 miles south of Lakeview. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Fairgrounds Housing around 1025 PM CDT. Lakeview around 1030 PM CDT. Mission around 1035 PM CDT. Sicangu Village and Antelope around 1040 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include White River, Swift Bear, Horse Creek, Haystack Butte, Littleburg and Hidden Timber. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
